name: Ajax Search Popup
author: Yasin Ti

sections.description:
This plugin to search by Post And Page on KeyUp with Ajax.
Live Ajax Search.
Easy To Customize.
Quick and easily access to information.

Usage

  1. To get started, click on the sub-menu Search Popup > Setting.
  2. You can use shortcode to run searchform.
  3. Example: [ajax_popup_search]
  4. Add to widget
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘ajax-search-popup’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the shortcode to your page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the ‘ajax-search-popup’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the shortcode to your page.

Can I change the all settings?

Yes. You can edit plugin php file and change the value or title.

Does this plugin has any restriction for usage?

No at all. You can use it for infinity.
